modName: Als Virility - Nude Male - PC ONLY
summary: Now only your male PC will be nude, instead of every man in the land...
descriptionHtml:
4/6/2012 -- If you want an equipable boner, both a large and more normally sized version are available here -> http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14285

UPDATE v1.3 -- 2/16/2012 -- All the options are now in one easy download! ^-^ Also, the gap behind the balls of VirilityBig (known simply as Virility ingame) has been fixed by Renbear!

***NEW OPTION***
XXL Penis by Papidamelo
Check out his original mod at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/members/editfile.php?id=7713

With his blessing, I have taken his body mesh and texes and turned them into a standalone item, as well, known as Virility Hung or Virility XXL. This optional file is complete by itself; you do not need the main file. However, it will work alongside the main file too, with no conflicts; however, you can only choose one of the male textures! Either Papidamelo's or Chris57's. Both are great, so don't stress out about it. ^-^

--Also added a GAG option based on Papidamelo's mesh. NOT MEANT TO BE TAKEN SERIOUSLY!

CREDITS

This mod would not be possible without the hard work of Chris57 and Sundracon, whose nude meshes and textures I have made use of. The only thing I did was take them and turn it into a standalone item.

Check out their great nude mods at:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3421 (Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488 (Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles)

For V1.3, thanks to Renbear, who fixed VirilityBig's mesh! ^-^

For V1.2, thanks to Adwath, who suggested using the tusks as crafting ingredients! ^-^

Also, a special thanks to:
SkyEdit and those who still work hard on it
Nifskope
Steam (for giving me an easy way to take screenshots)

Now, with that out of the way...

------

UPDATE 1.2 -- Implemented different crafting recipes for the members. Instead of 10 gold for the big and 5 gold for the normal, it's Mammoth Tusk + 6 Leather Strips for the big and Horker Tusk + 3 Leather Strips for the small. Also, the big one and the small come in two separate .esp files (both included in the download), as putting them into one .esp was causing a bug (at least on my comp) where both members would be the same size. You can check one or both .esp files under Data Files, as you like.

UPDATE 1.1 -- Due to all the jeers (oh horror! my self-esteem will surely never recover ^-^), I have uploaded a new version which includes an option to have a more realistically sized penis. Probably prettier too, without the graphical stretching. Both versions are craftable.

So I like the nude mods - get to look at the lovely ladies, and get to proudly display my PC's-- wait, this bandit I just looted is naked too! Ahh!

For those of you who are either straight (and don't want to see other guys' junk) or are sublimating their desires for sexual prowess (and don't want to see other guys' junk the same gonzo size as their PC's), or both (like me), this is definitely a hamper on my playstyle.

So, with the blessing of Chris57, I have taken a mesh and texture from his Better Males mod and turned them into a standalone item. In other words, when your male PC equips this item (appropriately known as Virility), he wil be naked. As this is a new item, no NPC will ever be wearing one of those. Congratulations, you are now the best hung man in Skyrim!

Some of you may notice that I decide to make my PC look like a gonzo porn star, as I upscaled the vertices of the mesh. Cuz, really, what's the point of strutting your stuff if you don't have any stuff to strut?

Boy, Freud would have a field day here.

Virility is also craftable at any forge, under Miscellaneous.

To clarify, this mod does NOT make any NPCs naked. It puts a new item in the game that, when equipped, will make YOU naked (if you are a guy). If you're a female, nothing will happen (thankfully!).

BUGS

Since I upscaled the vertices on the big version, but have no other meshing expertise, there is a slight gap between the back of the balls and the perineum. Not very noticeable... you have to look under your PC's legs from behind to see it.

INSTALLATION

You will need an unzipping utility such as IZarc to extract the contents of the Zip file you downloaded.

Extract the contexts of the zip file into your Skyrim/Data folder, clicking "Yes" any time you are asked if you want to merge folders or replace/override files. The only thing that it should ask if you want it to merge with will be the "meshes" folder, "textures" folder, and "clothes" folders, and that only if you have other mods utilizing those paths. Otherwise, the Virility meshes and textures have their own names separate from any other file.

PERMISSIONS

I'm not authorized to give any permissions for this, as the meshes and textures came from Chris57 and Sundracon, whose permission I myself had to ask to make this. So if you want to do anything, ask one of them.

CHANGELOG:

v1.0 -- 2/2/2012 -- First release! Watch the women drool... or maybe gasp in horror and slowly back away. My second mod ever.
v1.1 -- 2/2/2012 -- Includes more realistically sized version.
v1.2 -- 2/3/2012 -- Implemented different crafting recipes for the members. Instead of 10 gold for the big and 5 gold for the normal, it's Mammoth Tusk + 6 Leather Strips for the big and Horker Tusk + 3 Leather Strips for the small. Also, the big one and the small come in two separate .esp files (both included in the download), as putting them into one .esp was causing a bug (at least on my comp) where both members would be the same size. You can check one or both .esp files under Data Files, as you like.

____________________

[b][u]OTHER MODS BY ME[/u]:[/b]

Al's Completionist Series:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9994]Al's TREASURE VAULT[/url] -- [i]Now you have a place to store all your gold and have it display as treasure![/i]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30633]Als Paragon Reward Chest[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 5 Paragons[/i]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30643]Als Konahrik[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all vanilla dragon priest masks with a previously missing boss fight[/i]
4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30765]Als Treasure Map Reward[/url] -- [i]little mod rewarding the completionist player who collects all 11 Treasure Maps in vanilla Skyrim[/i]
5. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30915]Als Vault of the Old Slayer -- Requires All 10 Dragon Claws[/url] -- [i]modestly sized dungeon rewarding the completionist player who collects all Dragon Claws in vanilla Skyrim with fantastic amounts of treasure[/i]

Al's Powers and Abilities:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12859]Al's Thunder Smite[/url] -- [i]Insta-Kill Enemies, and ONLY Enemies[/i]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24486[/url]Al's Eclipse Bloodcurse[/url] -- [i]Tired of shooting arrows at the sun? Now you can get a true eclipse (including removed sun damage) as a power[/i]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35123]Als Shadow Walk - Automatic Invisibility While Sneaking[/url]
4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35045]Als Shout Like a Dragon - Dragonlike Cooldowns[/url] -- [i]Now you can shout as often as dragons can![/i]

Al's Conveniences:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25824]Al's Elsweyr Rift[/url] -- [i]Teleport to and from a one stop shop for selling loot and crafting items from anywhere![/i]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7728]Al's "Nothing Sells for Zero Gold" Tweak[/url] -- [i]I bet you're tired of picking up loot that sells for nothing. So am I[/i]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35234]Als Thuum of the Magesmith[/url] -- [i]Keep the benefits of your enchanted and smithed items even when you switch outfits for a different look![/i]
4. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13355]Al's -Get 80 Perk Points and All Skills 100- Cheat Ring[/url]

Al's Dungeons:
1. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13121]Al's Dead Dragon Giant Camp[/url] -- [i]Just as dragon lairs and giant camps are quick and easy (relatively) stops for a rich haul, so is this![/i]
2. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30915]Als Vault of the Old Slayer -- Requires All 10 Dragon Claws[/url]
3. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35295]Als Revakzoor - Lair of Mythic Dragons - Unfairly Difficult Mod[/url] -- [i]A lair laden with treasure, and guarded by six lethal dragons.[/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19697]Al's Three Stone Watch[/url] -- [i]Lore friendly, non-cheaty, humble starter home[/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7444]Al's Starry Armor and Clothing Retextures[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7648]Al's Virility - Nude Male - PC Only (Adult Content; NSFW)[/url]
